title: NodeBase
description: Canvas节点基础属性 - 所有节点类型共享的属性. Verified from JSON Canvas Spec 1.0

id.description: 节点唯一ID (Source: JSON Canvas Spec 1.0)

type.description: 节点类型 (Source: JSON Canvas Spec 1.0)

x.description: X坐标位置(像素) (Source: JSON Canvas Spec 1.0)

y.description: Y坐标位置(像素) (Source: JSON Canvas Spec 1.0)

width.description: 节点宽度(像素) (Source: JSON Canvas Spec 1.0)

height.description: 节点高度(像素) (Source: JSON Canvas Spec 1.0)

canvasColor.description: Canvas颜色值 - 预设色号或十六进制. 预设色号: 1=红, 2=橙, 3=黄, 4=绿, 5=青, 6=紫. 项目语义: 4=不理解, 3=似懂非懂, 2=已理解, 6=个人理解 (Source: JSON Canvas Spec 1.0)
